item.title: Report X-2024100583
item.description:
Report X-2024100583

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-11T09:22:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-04
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE KENTUCKY, ONE AIR PACKAGE WITH A GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING DURING TRAILER UNLOAD. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS THERE ARE THIRTY-FIVE VARIOUS PERFUMES AND COLOGNES SURROUNDED BY FOAM WRAPPING INSIDE THE BOX. THE LEAK WAS CAUSED BY A SINGLE 125 ML BOTTLE OF DIESEL FUEL FOR LIFE COLOGNE BEING SHATTERED. THE GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING IS THE ONLY DANGEROUS GOODS INDICATOR ON THE PACKAGE. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
